item.title: Our stance on AI and Interviewing
item.description: At DoorDash, we embrace AI as a tool to enhance the interview process, not to replace authenticity. For any accommodations regarding AI use, communicate with your recruiter early on. #DoorDash #AIInInterviews #JobPreparation #Authenticity…
